products:
GRANITE: our granite and marble slabs are selected from all over the world. Slabs come from Italy, Spain, Norway, Finland, the Ukraine, Brazil, India, Angola, Namibia, South Africa, Zimbabwe, and even Canada! As each slab of granite and marble is unique, we encourage all of our customers to hand select their individual slabs. Natural products have unique features and colouring; by hand selecting your individual slab, you can ensure the exact look you want to create. SGT will also supply samples for you to take home to ensure that your selection coordinates with the rest of your home, and your own natural lighting. 
MARBLE: Marble has a beauty that is unsurpassed. It can be used anywhere that a stone surface is desired. However, marble is much softer and more porous material than granite or quartz. Although marble is frequently used in European kitchens, North American homeowners tend not to be accepting of the marking and staining that comes along with using marble in a kitchen. North American homeowners tend to be happier using marble in bathrooms, on bar tops and fireplaces.
QUARTZ SURFACE  Quartz, also called engineered stone, and is a man made material. It is approximately 93% quartz aggregates and about 7% pigments and polymer resins. Quartz has a hard surface and is a low maintenance material. Quartz tends to have a more uniform pattern, and is available in a range of colours from blacks, whites, greys, beiges and browns to bright orange, lime green, cobalt blue and apple red. There is little variation in the different slabs of quartz; the man made quality provides a fairly uniform colour.
